title: Shortest Path Down Mt. St. Helens
description: I implemented the A* search algorithm and admissible heuristic functions to find the shortest path down Mt. Saint Helens from a certain elevation.

title: Connect 4 AI
description: I designed Alpha-Beta Pruning and Minimax-based algorithms to efficiently and competitively play the game of Connect-4 against other AI-based agents.

title: Deep Q-Learning Atari Pong
description: I implemented and trained a deep learning model for playing Atari Pong using Deep Q-Learning by representing game states & actions and creating an objective function.

title: Coursera for CodeLab Org
description: I developed a MERN web application in a cross-functional team that houses training material for members of a student org to learn basic web development skills through courses, bootcamps, and a progress check.

title: Shell Implementation
description: My team of 2 built a shell that accepts input from the user in the form of command lines and executes them as jobs. It understands built-in commands as well as piping and output redirection.

title: Personal Website
description: I built a responsive portfolio website from scratch using react, css, and figma, utilizing JSON for seamless content management. It will be continuously enhanced as more skills, projects, and animation interests are acquired.
